testcase.classname: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.name: user register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user click on register tab............................................passed And navigates to registration page..........................................passed When user use valid data in registration....................................passed And click on register button................................................passed Then user redirected to confirmation page...................................passed And user registered successfully............................................passed

testcase.classname: guest user could Login with valid credentials
testcase.name: guest user could Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user click on login tab...............................................passed And navigates to login page.................................................passed When user enter "test3@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully by going to home page and “My account” tab isDisplayed.passed
